revised_title: Growth and Form Transformation of the Female Pea-Crab Abdomen
tldr: The author analyzes the growth and form transformation of the abdomen in female pea-crabs, using polynomial regressions to understand the relationship between abdominal width and carapace size. The study provides a continuous, spatial and temporal definition of the abdomen's form change, which can be used as a key relation for understanding the transformation process.
